Package controller

Class ModifyProductForm

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyProductForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller class for the ModifyProductFrom scene.

    • OnModifyProductSaveButtonAction

      public void OnModifyProductSaveButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Saves the modified product data. Redirects back to the main screen. Ensures the inventory is between min and max and that min is not greater than max. The user must also confirm to save the product.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • OnModifyProductCancelButtonAction

      public void OnModifyProductCancelButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Cancels the modify product action and redirects to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • OnModifyProductSearchAction

      public void OnModifyProductSearchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Displays a list of parts based on name/ID. Shows all parts based if search box is empty. Displays error if nothing was found.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • OnModifyProductAddAction

      public void OnModifyProductAddAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Adds part from top to bottom table. Displays error if part cannot be added.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • OnModifyProductRemoveAction

      public void OnModifyProductRemoveAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Removes part from bottom table. Displays error if part cannot be removed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
